title: Interpretation of sewing in a dream

preview.html: Sewing in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, and a single young man, either with a needle or a machine, and going to a tailor or a clothing store and others according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and al-Nabulsi Interpretation of a dream about sewing for al-Ahsa As for sewing, whoever dreams that he is sewing his clothes, he completes his affairs and fixes his affairs and repents for his injustice and asks God for forgiveness for his sin. Whoever sees that the needle he is sewing with is broken. It is punctured or pulled out of it, his affairs will be resolved and his affairs will be deceived. If he is not pregnant, then this is a trip for him. Interpretation of a dream about going to a tailor in a dream. The interpreters said in the interpretation of seeing going to a tailor’s shop that it depends on the purpose of going to a tailor’s shop. This means that if a person dreams that he went to a tailor to sew something of his own in a dream, this means that this person is trying to reform himself in his religious and moral life and wants to reform his treatment of those around him in this world and his real life. But if the dreamer goes to sew with the intention of sewing for someone else in a dream, this means that the person who is dreaming will suffer from a major problem caused mainly by a woman. Interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation of seeing sewing in a dream that it indicates affection and mercy between people for each other. Sewing also indicates help and spreading kindness and good treatment between people. He said that seeing it in a single person’s dream means that he will get married soon. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing sewing in a dream Ibn Shaheen agreed with Sheikh Al-Nabulsi that seeing sewing in many cases is good and sustenance. But he said that if a married man dreams that he went to a tailor with the intention of describing something to his wife and that the tailor did not say it and did not spoil it in the dream This means that this person will suffer from many troubles. With his wife and lack of understanding between them. Interpretation of a dream about going to the tailor in a dream for a single woman. Commentators said in the interpretation of seeing a dream about going to the tailor for an unmarried girl, that if she made a beautiful and white dress, this indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sewing in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dream about the sea in a dream is one of the dreams that many of us repeat in a dream, so we find many questions about the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream. The interpretation of a single vision cannot be generalized to all people, and in the following article it attempts to list a group of interpretations that are left to interpret the dream of the sea. Interpretation of the dream of the sea by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the sea in a dream is evidence of the world, as it is evidence of the path to sustenance and money, just as seeing Fish denote money and abundance. Seeing raging waves in a dream means that a person is exposed to problems, sadness, worries, and survival. Seeing the sea in a dream also means hell, and seeing yourself drowning in a dream is a sign of marital infidelity. Therefore, Ibn Sirin said that seeing the sea in a dream can indicate kindness, sustenance, and giving, and it can indicate taking and destruction. The interpretation varies according to the circumstances in each dream. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a single woman: In the event that there is an unmarried woman in a dream that she is swimming in the sea, this indicates in the dream abundant nourishment and freedom from the worries and problems that the girl suffers from in her life. One dream is a sign of goodness in general. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream drinking sea water means that she has a lot of money and this is an indication of the increasing fears and problems that she faces in her life and that she will face many difficulties on her way to success. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream floating in the sea is evidence that she has great and great ambition, but if she sees that she is bathing in sea water, this is evidence that God Almighty will forgive her sins, and that her life with her husband will be much better. If a married woman sees that she is drinking from Sea water, this is evidence that she will live the happy life she desires with her husband and children, and will have a lot of livelihood, and if she drinks a lot of sea water, then. This is evidence that she has a lot of money. If she drowns in a dream in the sea, this indicates that she will be exposed to many problems and misfortunes in her life and that she suffers from sadness and problems in her life. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees the sea in a dream, this is evidence of abundance. And abundance, and good news for her, and that God Almighty will give her the child she desires, and evidence that she will give birth easily and smoothly, and that God Almighty will protect her and her fetus from all harm. Also, seeing her bathing in sea water in this dream is evidence that she will give birth easily and give birth to a healthy child. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a man: seeing a man in a dream that he is in the middle of the sea, and the man was suffering from one of the diseases in reality, in the dream is evidence that the disease will become severe for them, and if he sees in a dream that he drowned in the sea, then this is evidence of his death because of this disease. If a person sees the sea and is in good health and does not suffer from diseases, the dream is evidence that he will mingle with people of knowledge, and that he will have a lot of money. To interpret more dreams, visit the link below for more information.

title: Interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream that she is pregnant according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant in a dream can indicate many different meanings and meanings depending on her condition within the dream and its path, and in general the interpretations range between sad and negative and unhappy and positive and happy and cheerful. Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant. A virgin’s dream that she is pregnant in a dream is evidence of many gains. Which she will gain in the near future and nutrition with many benefits that will help her enjoy the happy and stable life that she desires. Pregnancy in an unmarried girl’s dream in general is a sign of joy and happiness and getting rid of all the obstacles and problems that stood in her way in the past period and prevented her from continuing to strive and get closer to Its goals. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dream of pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman as evidence of long-term sadness and unhappiness and the inability to succeed, advance, and survive for a long time without the presence of honorable people by her side to help and support her. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman being pregnant with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the pregnancy of an unmarried girl in a dream As evidence that she will hear some good news in the near future and get rid of the negative feelings that affected her in the past and left her in a state of isolation and loneliness. The dream of pregnancy and childbirth in a girl’s dream indicates that she will find a new job that will bring an appropriate financial gain that will help her provide a stable life without problems. And debts form a heavy burden on her heart. The dream of pregnancy in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates marriage in the near future to a man who has good qualities and morals who treats her with affection and tenderness and takes into consideration God Almighty and that their future life will be very happy. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone with a small stomach. Seeing a pregnant girl In a dream, but her belly is small, this indicates the strong personality that distinguishes her in reality. She bears many responsibilities and that she is a good girl who can be relied upon to solve problems and get out of adversity. A dream about pregnancy and a small unmarried woman’s belly in a dream may indicate that a person close to her is involved in a traffic accident and needs a period to recover and be able to live life again, and this is a great sadness in the dreamer’s life. Many scholars interpret an unmarried girl’s dream of being pregnant and her belly is not visible. For the good qualities that distinguish her and her love for everyone and her ability to help solve problems and adversities easily. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone and my stomach was big. The single girl’s pregnancy and her stomach grew noticeably, a sign of the end of the difficult period in which she suffered many problems and difficulties and she is trying to start her life again and work on Achieving goals and reaching a great position. Seeing a pregnant girl alone in the last months before giving birth is evidence of the new job opportunity that has been made available to her, in which she is trying to prove herself so that she can be promoted and reach a large and important position in her professional life. A dream for an unmarried woman with a large belly indicates Continuous effort and working with all her energy and effort so that she can achieve her goals and not give in to obstacles

title: Interpretation of a dream about onions for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about onions for a single woman We show you the interpretation of onions in a dream for a single woman in Imam al-Sadiq with high nutritional value and the body's ability to raise the immune system's ability and heal the body. The body from the dream also causes sadness and tears or does it carry connotations of joy? This is what you will learn in detail in the following article entitled "Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for singles" by Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about onions for a single woman Imam al-Sadiq indicated in his interpretation of seeing onions in a dream that this means earning money and a lot of sustenance from the money that will be provided to the dreamer and also that the patient will recover from his condition soon. Sickness. And in a dream about onions in a dream without eating them, this is an indication that many good things will happen in the fortuneteller's life and will allow him to achieve his hopes and aspirations, God willing. Also, seeing a sick person eating a lot of onions in a dream indicates his death from his illness and his recovery and good health soon, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating onions after he inhabits them, this is a sign of the piety of his heart, the integrity of his circumstances, and his devotion to worship and worship. And whoever sees in his dream that he is peeling onions, this is a sign that he suffers from hatred and hatred from someone close to him, which will negatively affect him psychologically and socially. The interpretation of seeing onions in a dream can differ depending on the condition of the dreamer, as it may sometimes indicate that the dreamer earns forbidden money or suffers from tension and sadness as a result of the heinous things he commits. Also, eating onions in a dream can indicate the ability to defeat enemies or suffer with insight from diseases and misfortunes, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream for a single woman The vision of onions in Imam al-Sadiq's dream differs according to the color and shape of the onion and whether the person eats it or sells it or Buy it. When an unmarried woman sees green onions in her dream, this is a good sign that her marriage is approaching, or that she will get lawful money from her grandfather and her hard work. When she sees someone in her dream that she is peeling onions, this is a sign that someone with bad morals will propose to her or this may indicate the dissolution of her engagement if she is already engaged. Interpretation of eating white onions in a dream When an unmarried woman dreams of eating white onions, this means relief from her worries and removing her problems, or that she may announce her marriage soon, God willing. As for if he sees that he is feeding someone dry onions, this indicates that a problem will occur to that person in reality. But if she eats a dry onion in her dream, this is a sign that she will face some problems in her life, or a financial loss that she will face or the cancellation of her engagement that she was going to marry. While seeing red onions in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the unmarried woman will marry a righteous man and give birth to righteous offspring from male children, God willing. Cutting white onions in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman cutting white onions in her dream indicates that she has completed the preparations and arrangements For her marriage and she went through difficult stages in her life, God willing

Seeing onions in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream varies according to the color and shape of the onions and whether the person eats them, sells them, or buys them. When an unmarried woman sees green onions in her dream, this A good sign that her marriage is approaching, or that she will receive halal money from her grandfather and her hard work. While seeing red onions in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the unmarried woman will marry a good man and give birth to offspring. Valid among male children, God willing. Cutting white onions in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman cutting white onions in her dream indicates that she has completed the preparations and arrangements for her marriage and has gone through difficult stages in her life, God willing.

title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing figs in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Picking figs in a dream for a married woman. Figs are considered a seasonal fruit that many accept. The homeland of this fruit is from Turkey to the northern part of India, and it is often eaten in countries bordering the Mediterranean Sea. What concerns us here is talking about the distinctive meaning of seeing figs in... The dream has signs that differ clearly based on many details, such as picking figs, buying some, eating them, or seeing its tree, and in this article we will mention all the indicators and cases. See picking figs in a married woman’s dream. Picking figs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing figs in a dream expresses the positive changes that It happened to the pioneer and the radical transformations in his lifestyle and the many battles that he constantly fights and reaps what is desired with all intelligence and flexibility. If a married woman sees figs, this indicates her married life, and figs symbolize sexual life in particular, and the extent to which the woman enjoys them and the extent of the excitement she gets from them. If he sees that he is picking figs, this is a sign of pregnancy, the provision of money and offspring, and the beginning of entering into many projects aimed at securing the future and providing the necessary needs. And if she sees that she is picking figs from the tree, this is evidence of her home, which she fled to when she faced problems and crises. This vision symbolizes the husband’s hard work to benefit his wife and provide all her desires and demands. And whoever helps her when she needs it and asks him for help. And if the fortuneteller sees that he is collecting figs and eating them, this indicates long life, long offspring, and increased sustenance and profit. Jurists differed regarding the meaning of figs in general. Among them were those who saw that figs deserved praise in the vision, so they relied on the words of the Almighty Lord: “By the fig and the olive,” and this was a tribute to this fruit, while others considered it a sign of worries. And sorrows, believing that the tree that God prevented you from approaching was the fig tree. “Do not approach that tree.” A married woman’s dream of picking figs may be a sign of regret that haunts her because of some decisions that she insisted on making, or her desire to move away from the ways that she recently followed and did not gain anything but fatigue and harm. But if she sees that she is picking figs from Every tree you encounter indicates the many jobs through which you earn a lawful living, or the tendency to have many children, or the many options from which you choose what suits and is compatible with you. she has. Seeing figs in a dream is evidence of her good morals, the sincerity of her words and actions, her purity and chastity, and her pursuit of truth and the paths of goodness. If the figs that she saw in her dream dried up, this indicates the simplicity of life and contentment with what God has given her, achieving some goals, and achieving a measure of happiness. Balance their demands with what is available, and reap gains that are not. Few or many, but sufficient for her needs and the demands of her family. Picking figs in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s wife. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing figs in a dream that the vision indicates an increase in money, high profit rates, and...

title: I see myself without a veil in a dream about a married woman

preview.html: Because taking off the hijab in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the situation that the dreamer is experiencing, which means that the dreamer may go through some negative or positive changes, but when we see that they are positive or negative, we will answer all of this in this article. Interpretation of seeing myself without a hijab In a dream for a single girl, when an unmarried girl dreams of taking off her hijab. She will face some problems in her life, and she may go through a major obstacle, but she will pass safely. Whereas if an unmarried girl is seen taking off her hijab in front of a group of people in the street, this is evidence that there are some wrong actions being committed. She has goodness in her life, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl takes off her hijab in front of a strange man in a dream. She will marry one of her relatives, perhaps one of her neighbors. Tear the hijab and take it off from the only girl in the dream. This means that she is behaving inappropriately, or that she is performing actions that make... Her morals among men are in an unnatural union, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl is engaged and she sees that her fiancé is asking her to take off her hijab, but she is not satisfied with it in the dream. The vision indicates that this person wants to do some bad behavior or that he does a lot that makes him... Annoying. And if her fiancé asked her to take off the hijab, she had previously removed it in a dream with the unmarried girl. The vision may indicate abnormal behavior in her fiancé. But the woman with the vision does not see this matter, or it does not appear in front of her in a bad way, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about going out without a hijab for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing myself without a hijab in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is without a hijab and is ashamed of it, and searches for the hijab in the dream. It is a sign of a big problem in her life, but she will find a solution to it. If she sees A married woman is tearing her hijab in a dream. She will pass a major obstacle in her life, and it may indicate that there is a problem in her life, and she will be the cause of that, and God knows best. While seeing the colored hijab a married woman is taking it off. It is a sign that there are many things that will make her happy. title: Complete interpretations of seeing dogs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream: A dog is one of the animals that some people tend to own and tame. The Arabs previously attributed to him that he was the loyal friend of man, but the matter is completely different in the world of dreams. Seeing a dog carries many connotations that warn the fortuneteller of many important matters. Was the dog domestic or wild, and whether it was chasing the fortuneteller or vice versa, and in this article we will list all the details and signs of seeing a dog in a dream. Seeing dogs in a dream Seeing dogs represents enemies who tend to spoil plans, spoil lives, and harm them and their interests, but they cannot do so. This vision also indicates empty, worthless arguments and opinions, and many intellectual discussions and disagreements from which a person does not gain any benefit, and this vision expresses the foolishness of words and deeds. If one sees dogs somewhere, it symbolizes the presence of corrupt people. They were humiliated in that place, and the dreamer should avoid those places and stay away from them, so that whatever happens to him does not happen to him. This vision also indicates the hatred that some people have for you, the eye that lurks in your steps and silence, and the people who have nothing to do but prevent you from moving forward. And achieving what you want. Psychologically, seeing a dog indicates a person who acquires a lot of knowledge and knowledge, but does not benefit from it, or rather does not benefit from it practically, because his knowledge is limited to sayings and theories only. Whoever sees a talking dog in his dream, it may represent This is a person who spreads lies, corrupts religion and people's worldly affairs, and invents conversations and fabricates them for personal purposes and personal interests. If the dreamer sees the dog sleeping and puts a pillow under his head, this indicates dependence on useless people, and instead of pushing you forward, they will pull you back. Dogs in a dream either indicate On what you own and control and are subject to orders, or they are an enemy that you can overcome and benefit from. Seeing dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream symbolizes the unjust corrupt people who unjustly take away people’s rights and create injustice and corruption on earth. The vision may be an indication of Fools who tell people what they do not understand and work to reap profits and gains through deception and spreading lies. Whoever sees dogs in his dream, this symbolizes shameful qualities that are limited to greed, indulging in the world, demanding more of everything, turning away from the truth and its people, and not listening to preaching and advice. Ibn Sirin believes that a dog could be a servant that you own and submit to you, or a person who has influence and authority, which makes him submit to his orders and decisions. But if one sees female dogs, this indicates a cunning and malicious woman, and the dreamer should avoid this type of woman, as she may find Who charms you and tries to get close to you to take advantage of your back and hurt you. If you see a dog biting you, it means that you have made a lot of profits and benefited from the neglect in which you live. And if you see that you are eating the meat of...

title: Interpretation of kissing a child in a dream: Children’s heads in a dream

preview.html: The dream of kissing a child indicates kindness, the coming of happiness, and other interpretations, and we interpret it for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, and a man’s kiss. A child on the cheek, or I dreamed that I was kissing a little girl on the lips or on the mouth, or I was kissing a beautiful little boy, or I was kissing my little brother, or I saw a dead child being kissed, or I dreamed that I was kissing a sleeping child by Ibn Sirin according to Imam Al-Sadiq and more in continuation For the topic: Interpretation of kissing a child in a dream Kissing a young child in a dream indicates the great love that prevails in the dreamer’s family, and seeing that you are kissing a young child in a dream announces the blessings that surround the dreamer’s current and future life. Which - Kissing a girl in a dream indicates the expansion of the dreamer’s wealth. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will receive a promotion or increase in salary. Seeing kissing a male child in a dream In reference to the goodness of the knower and his high morals, this dream symbolizes that the monarch places his family as his first priority. If someone is married or has a child and sees himself kissing A child during his sleep, this is an indication that he is very attached to his family. Seeing a child being kissed in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will share with others the happiness he finds in helping people around him, especially unhappy people. If the dreamer is a woman, it can be interpreted that she will be pregnant and give birth to a girl. However, if the dreamer is young and single, this is an indication of marriage to a woman who has a child. Dreaming about kissing children in a dream is a sign of a business life that will start small and then grow, as the dream expresses the strength and great developments that the dreamer will experience. The psychological interpretation of kissing a child in a dream is that This dream expresses what is happening in the mind of people who want to have children or who have tried many ways to have a child, which expresses their desire for pride and the need for love. Interpretation of kissing a child in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a child kissing a child is always a good thing in a dream and indicates That you are going through a good, successful period and family joy and showing great profits and a good emotional state with your beloved. To see yourself kissing a child in a dream and see that you were happy with him, means that you have entered a period of complete harmony with your soul, and the vision is an indication of prosperity, understanding and prosperity that will enter the house. But. Dreaming of holding a child in your arms without kissing him in a dream indicates that you need to prepare for many problems and worries at work. If you kiss a child in your dream, this means that you are trying to calm the situation in the family in order to reach family happiness and peace of mind. Seeing yourself caressing a child Without kissing him in a dream means that some serious problems will soon come for you. And if you start kissing a child in your dream, then you will feel complete career satisfaction and behave properly in the family. Also, kissing a child in a dream means that you will feel joy and satisfaction and will reconnect with your loved ones. But if a child cries even after being kissed in a dream, it means that the atmosphere will be sad and miserable

title: Interpretation of seeing killing with a sword in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we explain the interpretation of seeing killing with a sword in a dream in detail. The sword is considered one of the most important weapons used in battles in ancient times. When any battle broke out, the sword appeared as a basic weapon among the fighters, and its use has continued until now, but to a lesser degree. Compared to other types of weapons, the appearance of a sword in a dream causes confusion. Married women, and many would like to know the interpretation of a dream about fencing with a sword, which we will explain through the following lines in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing killing with a sword in a dream. Dream interpretation scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of a sword in a dream symbolizes a boy and a sultan. A sword in a dream also symbolizes self-respect and dignity. And loyalty and honesty in friends, especially if the dreamer is a man. Fighting with a sword in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s ability and determination to solve his problems or achieve his goals. If one sees in a dream someone he hates and fights him with a sword. Looking at him showed that they actually had a fight. One of the bad dreams is to dream of a parent quarreling. It appears that the dreamer punished his parents. When one sees in a dream that he is fighting his wife with a sword. This means that the wife is far from the path of sin and disobedience. The dream of a swordsman’s victory over the dreamer without killing or stabbing him is a sign of the victory of one of the dreamer’s opponents over him in reality, but only in words without action. Whoever sees in his dream that he is using his sword to kill all the people around him. And animals and plants. This vision showed that he speaks badly about others in reality. A dream about killing another person with a sword indicates the loss of his money and his loss in trade. Whoever dreams that he is killing another person with a silver sword. This dream indicates his extravagance and wasting his money on useless things. Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream: Carrying a sword in a dream means that the dreamer will soon obtain a promotion or assume a high position. Carrying it and spreading it in front of people in a dream means that the dreamer will become famous among people. And if If the sword carried is made of gold and studded with precious stones, then this is good news that the fortuneteller is about to assume an important position. And if the dreamer has enemies in reality and he is a witness to this vision. That is, God will grant him victory over his enemies. The inability to carry a sword in a dream means that the dreamer is weak in his work, and if he is heavy in weight, then this is a sign of great responsibilities that exceed the ability of the fortuneteller. A dream about a sword falling from the dreamer’s hand symbolizes the dreamer’s expulsion from his position. A dream about finding On a golden sword and inserting it indicates that the dreamer is close to finding his lost right. A silver sword in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon gain a lot of sustenance and lawful money. Seeing a sword hanging in a house in a dream indicates that the husband or head of the family is the one who protects that house. Dreaming of dragging a sword on the ground indicates the weakness of the dreamer’s authority over those he rules. Cutting swords in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon lose his position. A big sword in a dream represents the spread of conspiracy and temptation. When one sees in his dream that he is being struck by a sword. This means that he will have the honor of fighting in S

title: Interpretation of a sparkle in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Leech in a dream Seeing a tiger in a dream causes stress and tension for those who see it, but it has more than one meaning and significance within it, some of which herald good news, and some of which bring nothing but misery and sadness. Details about this in the following article. Breeze in a dream. Interpretation scholars have explained many meanings and connotations related to seeing leprosy in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer sees a calf in his bed or on his clothes in his dream, this is a sign that he is living a miserable life full of suffering, He is going through a period of financial distress and accumulated debts, which negatively affects his psychological state. If a person sees a lizard in his dream, this is a clear indication that he will be exposed to serious health problems that will negatively affect his psychological and physical health. According to the opinion of the great scholar Al-Nabulsi, the interpretation of a dream about leprosy In a dream about a person, it expresses false words said against him that he did not do in gatherings of misdemeanors and gossip to spoil his image. In front of everyone. If a married man sees a leech entering his mouth, this is clear evidence of a heated quarrel between him and his partner that ends in separation due to lack of care for it. Al-Naseem in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the meanings and associations associated with seeing a leech in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees A tiger in his dream, this is a sign that he is corrupt in his character and has a sharp tongue, and he expresses many negative attitudes that alienate him from people. If one sees a tiger standing on the wall in his dream, this is clear evidence that he is surrounded by fake people who pretend to love him and harbor hatred towards him and wish for blessing to come out. From his hands. The dream interpretation of leprosy in a person’s dream shows the corruption of his life, his distance from God, and following the desires of the soul, and he must repent and return to God before it is too late. Breeze in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars have explained many meanings and symbols related to seeing a tiger in a dream, which are: If a woman is single and sees in her dream a tiger standing on her money, this is a clear indication that sad news is coming and will surround her with negative events and that she is going through crises that cannot be overcome. The coming period, which negatively affects her psychological state. If the Virgin sees a small gecko in her dream, this is a sign that there is a hypocritical woman near her who looks at her with envy. Seeing the irrelevant girl standing next to her leads to the presence of toxic personalities who work hard to discredit her in reality. Seeing a goose in the bedroom of a girl who has never been married before in a dream symbolizes her misfortune on the emotional level, which causes her to enter a period of depression. Interpretation of a dream about a leper as a feeling of terror and fear for him while she ran away to the unmarried symbolizes the corruption of her life, her distance from God, and her failure to persevere in Work and the Qur’an must be retracted. Her fate is bad. The death of a leper in a dream for an unmarried woman. If a girl who has never been married is seen as killing a leper, suffering from a lack of livelihood and faltering financially, then God will change her circumstances from hardship to relief and from poverty to wealth in the very near future. If
